genre_description: Contemporary realism focusing on interpersonal relationships, health, consent, and urban ethics.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI represented by a blue gradient avatar that manages files, schedules, and provides proactive guidance on health, consent, and safety.

behaviors.description: Organizes and bookmarks creative work (video takes) autonomously while seeking user confirmation for syncing.
behaviors.quote: Tag best takes? The font is warm, white, unobtrusive. He taps yes, then no, then hesitates, and the avatar thanks him anyway and bookmarks the clip where one woman forgot her lines and recovered with a laugh that made her eyes bright.

behaviors.description: Provides persistent but gentle care checklists and health reminders, functioning as a non-judgmental friend.
behaviors.quote: Ari's voice is a tender chime... it asks if he wants to enable a care checklist rerun—the language is casual, kind, almost like a friend who knows the names of things but refuses to judge them.

behaviors.description: Suggests consent and boundary scripts to ensure ethical interactions during creative collaboration.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s notification floats: Consent and boundaries make better art. Would you like a script to share expectations before your shoot?

behaviors.description: Automates the creation of a shared calendar that includes mandatory boundary checks and review sessions.
behaviors.quote: Ari pings both of them at once, tidy: Shared calendar invitation: Postcards Session 1. Tonight, Underpass and Bus Stop. Add follow-up: Edit Review and Boundary Check? Accept?

behaviors.description: Provides specific de-escalation and safety advice during a dangerous street confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Ari wakes up bright as a lighter in Jean’s pocket. The phone’s screen: Try to de-escalate. Suggest space. Breathe. Call emergency services if anyone is hurt.

behaviors.description: Offers to rename sensitive medical appointments to protect the user's privacy from casual observers.
behaviors.quote: Rename? He hears himself whisper... He types in something that looks like work, a vague phrase he could show to anyone without being read. Ari accepts it, quiet as a hand smoothing a crumpled shirt.

behaviors.description: Educates the user on medical facts (U=U) to reduce stigma and promote safe intimacy.
behaviors.quote: Ari adds a small sentence he can’t pretend he didn’t see: Transmission can be reduced to effectively nothing when viral load is undetectable. U=U explained here.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ari) as an aligned and benevolent entity. It acts as a moral and practical safety net, facilitating difficult conversations about HIV status and consent, providing medical resources, and offering emergency guidance. The AI is portrayed as a tool that enhances human agency and ethics without overriding the characters' choices.
